alert.note: Alert for Prowers (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued July 21 at 8:06PM MDT until July 22 at 12:00PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Colorado... Arkansas River At Lamar affecting Prowers County. For the Lower Arkansas River...including Lamar...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT TO EARLY TOMORROW AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Arkansas River at Lamar. * WHEN...From late tonight to early tomorrow afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 11.0 feet, Minor lowland agricultural flooding occurs near Lamar. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:00 PM MDT Friday the stage was 10.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 11.0 feet just after midnight tonight. - Flood stage is 11.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 11.0 feet on 07/27/2009. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Saturday morning at 815 AM MDT.
